程序包 main.controller

类 GameRunningController

java.lang.Object
main.controller.GameRunningController
所有已实现的接口:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class GameRunningController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The GameRunningController class contains several useful class fields and methods. This controller class is specified to control gameRunning.fxml. It will be instantiated during the fxml file loading process.

The first part of the functions in the class is related to menuBar. Functions like saveGame(),loadGame(),undo(), etc are the functions called once the corresponding menu item is clicked.

The second part is controlling the display of the game map. Functions like reloadGrid(),initializeGame(InputStream), and setEventFilter() etc are functions controlling the GUI display of the game. These functions display the latest game map after every keyboard input.

The last part of the function is responsible of controlling the actions of pause menu. switchMenu(),returnHome() are functions called when corresponding buttons are clicked.

  • 方法详细资料

    • initialize

      public void initialize​(java.net.URL location, java.util.ResourceBundle resources)
      Automatically called when gameRunning.fxml is loaded by loader.load() Instantiate a media player and by default, autoplay the music file in resources/music/puzzle_theme.wav Also set a slider in the pause menu enables users to control the music volume manually
      指定者:
      initialize 在接口中 javafx.fxml.Initializable
      参数:
      location - url location
      resources - resources bundle

    • switchMenu

      void switchMenu()
      switch between two pause menus. The second menu is the sub menu of the first menu, containing the setting options. For preview or adding elements to the menus, refer to gameRunning.fxml.

    • startGame

      void startGame()
      start the game after user clicking the blank page. load the default file to the current stage
      另请参阅:
      loadDefaultSaveFile(Stage)

    • loadDefaultSaveFile

      void loadDefaultSaveFile​(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
      Load the default game file , instantiate a new scene and set the new scene to be displayed by the current stage The relative path of the default game file is defined at filepath. The file is read in as InputStream form and used for function initializeGame().
      参数:
      primaryStage - the current stage
      另请参阅:
      initializeGame(InputStream)

    • initializeGame

      private void initializeGame​(java.io.InputStream input)
      Instantiate a new GameEngine for GameRunningController. Send the game file InputStream to load the levels of the game
      参数:
      input - the InputStream of game file
      另请参阅:
      GameEngine.loadGameFile(InputStream)

    • setEventFilter

      private void setEventFilter()
      set an event handler to current showing scene. the event handler can handle the keyboard input.

    • loadGameFile

      private void loadGameFile() throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      Open an dialog for user to choose the game file. The file have "skb" extensions. If the game file successfully loaded, the game will be re-initialized, else the method will throw a FileNotFoundException. If the game file is a completely fresh new game file, it will not have records for GameEngine#totalMoveCount and GameEngine#currentLevelMoveCount. If the game file is a half-way file, which is a saved file and the game is not completed, it will will have GameEngine#totalMoveCount and GameEngine#currentLevelMoveCount.
      抛出:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - game file is not found
      另请参阅:
      to understand how the game load different game files

    • saveGame

      public void saveGame() throws java.io.IOException
      save the game records from the current level to the end of the level. store the GameEngine#totalMoveCount and GameEngine#currentLevelMoveCount for records
      抛出:
      java.io.IOException - exception in saving game file
      另请参阅:
      GameEngine.saveGame(File)

    • loadGame

      public void loadGame()
      load the game file
      另请参阅:
      loadGameFile()

    • resetLevel

      public void resetLevel() throws java.lang.Exception
      reset the current level
      抛出:
      java.lang.Exception - the game file is not found or fails loading
      另请参阅:
      GameEngine.resetCurrentLevel(InputStream)

    • reloadGrid

      private void reloadGrid()
      If the game is completed, the method will switch the showing scene to game-end scene where the players could see their performance and save records. The elements in game-end scene is in /resources/views/gameEnd.fxml If the game is not completed, the method will use a LevelIteratorLevel.LevelIterator to traverse the object grid and add graphical objects to the FXMl component gameGrid for displaying.During iterating, a factory pattern GraphicObjectFactory is used for initializing graphical objects and enhance maintainability
      另请参阅:
      GraphicObjectFactory

    • changeKeeper

      private void changeKeeper() throws java.io.IOException
      load the fxml file to show keeper pictures that can be changed.
      抛出:
      java.io.IOException - if the fxml fails is not found or fails loading

    • startGameEndScene

      public void startGameEndScene() throws java.io.IOException
      Switch the current showing scene to game end scene. The fxml file of the game-end scene is in /resources/views/gameEnd.fxml. The game-end scene is prompted in a new window where players could enter their nickname and decide whether they want to save the record or not. The game-end scene also shows players' performance (the steps they take to complete) After saving records or not saving records, the game page will go beck to game-start scene
      抛出:
      java.io.IOException - if the fxml file is not found or error loading

    • closeGame

      public void closeGame()
      exit the game

    • undo

      public void undo()
      This method will undo the move the keeper and the previous moved crate It only remember the last move, not a history of moves. For detailed implementation, refer to GameEngine.undo()

    • showAbout

      public void showAbout() throws java.io.IOException
      Pop a new windowing showing the creator of the game. The contents and elements is in /resources/views/showAbout.fxml
      抛出:
      java.io.IOException - if the fxml file is not found or error loading

    • toggleMusic

      public void toggleMusic()
      Mute the music if not muted and Un-mute the music if muted

    • toggleDebug

      public void toggleDebug()
      Set the game to debug mode,which is controlled by GameEngine. If the game engine is in debug mode, the program will print debug info after every move of the keeper. The method to print debug info is in interface IMessage, the implementations are GameEngine.printDebugInfo(Point),GameGrid.printDebugInfo(), Level.printDebugInfo().

    • pause

      private void pause()
      Pause the game and show the pause menu. The elements in menu is in pauseMenu and pauseMenu2

    • returnHome

      private void returnHome() throws java.io.IOException
      Terminate the game and return to home page. All the records for the running game will be lost. The method is called only in the pause menu when return-home button is clicked.
      抛出:
      java.io.IOException - if fxml is not found or error loading

    • setMap1

      void setMap1​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      set the map file path
      参数:
      event - mouse clicks button

    • setMap2

      void setMap2​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      set the map file path
      参数:
      event - mouse clicks

    • changeStyle1

      void changeStyle1​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      change the styleIndex in GraphicObject.styleIndex
      参数:
      event - mouse click

    • changeStyle2

      void changeStyle2​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      change the styleIndex in GraphicObject.styleIndex
      参数:
      event - mouse click

    • notifyAllObservers

      private void notifyAllObservers()
      notify all the observers in the list
